00014 #ifndef WFAPI_SCREENPOINT_H
00015 #define WFAPI_SCREENPOINT_H
00016 
00017 #include "PALMachineTypes.h"
00018 
00019 #ifdef WFAPI_IOSTREAM_AVAILABLE
00020 #include <iostream>
00021 #endif
00022 
00023 namespace WFAPI {
00024    
00031 class ScreenPoint {
00032 public:
00034    typedef wf_int32 coord_t;
00035    
00042    ScreenPoint(coord_t xPos, coord_t yPos) : x(xPos), y(yPos) {}
00043 
00047    ScreenPoint() : x(0), y(0) {}
00048    
00054    inline const coord_t getX() const { return x; }
00055    
00061    inline const coord_t getY() const { return y; }
00062 
00068    inline coord_t& getX() { return x; }
00069 
00075    inline coord_t& getY() { return y; }
00076    
00080    inline bool operator==(const ScreenPoint& rhs) const {
00081       return getX() == rhs.getX() && getY() == rhs.getY();
00082    }
00083 
00087    inline bool operator!=(const ScreenPoint& rhs) const {
00088       return getX() != rhs.getX() || getY() != rhs.getY();
00089    }
00090 #ifdef WFAPI_OSTREAM_AVAILABLE
00091    inline friend std::ostream& operator<< (std::ostream& strm,
00092                                            const ScreenPoint& other)
00093    {
00094       strm << "( " << other.getX() << ", " << other.getY() << " )";
00095       return strm;
00099    inline bool operator!=(const ScreenPoint& rhs) const {
00100       return !(*this==rhs);
00101    }
00102 #endif
00103    
00104 
00105 private:
00107    coord_t x;
00109    coord_t y;
00110 
00111 };
00112 
00113 } // End of namespace WFAPI
00114 
00115 #endif // WFAPI_SCREENPOINT_H
